column1: Traffic reports will resume Wednesday April 26 at 4:00 p.m.

column5: Dark traffic signals due to a damaged traffic box.  Police are directing traffic.  Use added caution.

column3: Traffic Alert for E Main St:
column4: The roadway is shut down in both directions between Walton Ave and Park Ave due to downed wires.

column3: Traffic Alert for E Main St:
column4: Inbound traffic diverted to Walton Ave.  Outbound traffic diverted to Park Ave.
